name: Carpet ITP
Details
Working to latest plan revisions and check latest correspondence
Prior works checks
Area free of building debris and trade tools
Walls plastered and first coat of paint
All adjacent finishes completed and ready to receive finishes. Area to be flagged if LF cannot finish 100%
Specification checks - Correct materials as per finishes schedule and sample approvals
Installation procedure as per manufacturer's recommendations and AUS standards -
Barricaded areas
Vacuum area and minor patch as required
Apply Intertact Pressure Sensitive adhesive
Installation pattern and direction followed
Installation complete and rubbish placed in bins provided
Install 150mm feather edge skirting
Protection - woven plastic
Confirm material warranty applies
Confirm installation warranty 12 months applies
Care and maintenance as per O&Ms
Vinyl ITP
Details
Working to latest plan revisions and check latest correspondence
Prior works checks
Area free of building debris and trade tools
Walls plastered and first coat of paint
All adjacent finishes completed and ready to receive finishes. Area to be flagged if LF cannot finish 100%
Specification checks - Correct materials as per finishes schedule and sample approvals
Installation procedure as per manufacturer's recommendations and AUS standards -
Barricaded areas
Grind, vac and clean
Apply moisture barrier as required
Prime and self level as quoted (3mm)
Set out vinyl to minimise waste and cross joins
Apply cove fillet to perimeter as required
Install vinyl and cove with recommended adhesive
Heavy roll finished floor
Protection - corflute plastic
Confirm material warranty applies
Confirm installation warranty 12 months applies
Care and maintenance as per O&Ms

Timber ITP
Details
Working to latest plan revisions and check latest correspondence
Prior works checks
Area free of building debris and trade tools
Walls plastered and first coat of paint
All adjacent finishes completed and ready to be finishes. Area to be flagged if LF cannot finish 100%
Specification checks - Correct materials as per finishes schedule and sample approvals
Installation procedure as per manufacturer's recommendations and AUS standards -
Barricaded areas
Vac and clean area
Floor prep (grind, MB, 3mm) as required
Ensure joinery kickers, skirting boards etc removed where possible
Set out Rezil sleeper system as per manufacturer recommendations
Set out solid timber to sleepers
Install timber with recommended adhesive and secret nails
Allow for expansion gaps at perimeter and to fixtures
Sand and seal timber as per manufacturer recommendations
Protection - corflute plastic
Confirm material warranty applies
Confirm installation warranty 12 months applies
Care and maintenance as per O&Ms
